name: Faster Than Possible
description:
As the name implies the goal of the game is to be faster than possible. Learn the game mechanic and try to get the lowest time by abusing triple jump, wall climb, and wall hugging mechanics!

Key Features:
1. Collect Coins To Get A Faster Time!
2. Collect Gems To Slow Down Time!
3. Speedrun Each Level, 10 Total Levels!
4. Avoid Traps And Tricks!
5. Steam Achievements
6. Steam Leaderboard For Each Level!
7. Level Unlock System!
8. Local Best Time System!
9. Controller/Game-pad support while in game-play! (Xbox, PlayStation, Ect.)
